Trade/Device Name(s): Ascensia® CONTOUR® Blood Glucose Monitoring System (modified test strip)
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Ascensia® CONTOUR® Blood Glucose Monitoring System meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Ascensia® CONTOUR® Blood Glucose Monitoring System (modified test strip) for glucose measurement in whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: For the measurement of glucose in whole blood; intended for over-the-counter use by persons with diabetes and by healthcare professionals in home and healthcare settings using capillary, venous, or arterial whole blood samples.
